version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="delivery"> <delivery id="3" name="Delivery"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <motechId/> <date/> <mode/> <outcome/> <maleInvolved/> <deliveryLocation/> <deliveredBy/> <complications/> <vvf/> <maternalDeath/> <comments/> <child1Outcome/> <child1RegistrationType/> <child1MotechId/> <child1Sex/> <child1FirstName/> <child1Weight/> <child2Outcome/> <child2RegistrationType/> <child2MotechId/> <child2Sex/> <child2FirstName/> <child2Weight/> <child3Outcome/> <child3RegistrationType/> <child3MotechId/> <child3Sex/> <child3FirstName/> <child3Weight/> <sender/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>delivery-jf</formname> </delivery> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/delivery/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/delivery/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/delivery/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/delivery/date" required="true()" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xf:bind id="mode" nodeset="/delivery/mode" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="outcome" nodeset="/delivery/outcome" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="maleInvolved" nodeset="/delivery/maleInvolved" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="deliveryLocation" nodeset="/delivery/deliveryLocation" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="deliveredBy" nodeset="/delivery/deliveredBy" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="complications" nodeset="/delivery/complications" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="vvf" nodeset="/delivery/vvf" relevant="/delivery/complications = '6'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="maternalDeath" nodeset="/delivery/maternalDeath" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="comments" nodeset="/delivery/comments" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="child1Outcome" nodeset="/delivery/child1Outcome" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child1RegistrationType" nodeset="/delivery/child1RegistrationType" relevant="/delivery/child1Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child1MotechId" nodeset="/delivery/child1MotechId" relevant="/delivery/child1RegistrationType = 'USE_PREPRINTED_ID'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child1Sex" nodeset="/delivery/child1Sex" relevant="/delivery/child1Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child1FirstName" nodeset="/delivery/child1FirstName" relevant="/delivery/child1Outcome = 'A'" type="xsd:string" visible="false()" required="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child1Weight" nodeset="/delivery/child1Weight" relevant="/delivery/child1Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:decimal" visible="false()" constraint=". >= 0.2 and . <= 11" message="Value out of range: must be between 0.2 and 11"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child2Outcome" nodeset="/delivery/child2Outcome" relevant="/delivery/outcome = '2' or /delivery/outcome = '3'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child2RegistrationType" nodeset="/delivery/child2RegistrationType" relevant="/delivery/child2Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child2MotechId" nodeset="/delivery/child2MotechId" relevant="/delivery/child2RegistrationType = 'USE_PREPRINTED_ID'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child2Sex" nodeset="/delivery/child2Sex" relevant="/delivery/child2Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child2FirstName" nodeset="/delivery/child2FirstName" relevant="/delivery/child2Outcome = 'A'" type="xsd:string" visible="false()" required="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child2Weight" nodeset="/delivery/child2Weight" relevant="/delivery/child2Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:decimal" visible="false()" constraint=". >= 0.2 and . <= 11" message="Value out of range: must be between 0.2 and 11"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child3Outcome" nodeset="/delivery/child3Outcome" relevant="/delivery/outcome = '3'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child3RegistrationType" nodeset="/delivery/child3RegistrationType" relevant="/delivery/child3Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child3MotechId" nodeset="/delivery/child3MotechId" relevant="/delivery/child3RegistrationType = 'USE_PREPRINTED_ID'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child3Sex" nodeset="/delivery/child3Sex" relevant="/delivery/child3Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child3FirstName" nodeset="/delivery/child3FirstName" relevant="/delivery/child3Outcome = 'A'" type="xsd:string" visible="false()" required="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="child3Weight" nodeset="/delivery/child3Weight" relevant="/delivery/child3Outcome = 'A'" required="true()" type="xsd:decimal" visible="false()" constraint=". >= 0.2 and . <= 11" message="Value out of range: must be between 0.2 and 11"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". < 2147483647" id="sender" message="Invalid phone number: number too large" nodeset="/delivery/sender" relevant="/delivery/child1RegistrationType = 'AUTO_GENERATE_ID' or /delivery/child2RegistrationType = 'AUTO_GENERATE_ID' or /delivery/child3RegistrationType = 'AUTO_GENERATE_ID'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/delivery/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/delivery/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page1</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Delivery date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="mode"> <xf:label>Delivery mode</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Normal</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>C-Section</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Vacuum</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>Forceps</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="outcome"> <xf:label>Delivery outcome</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Singleton</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Twins</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Triplets</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="maleInvolved"> <xf:label>Male involvement</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="deliveryLocation"> <xf:label>Location</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Gov't HC/HP</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Teaching hospital</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Gov't hospital</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>Private hospital</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="5"> <xf:label>CHAG</xf:label> <xf:value>5</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="6"> <xf:label>Quasi-gov't institute</xf:label> <xf:value>6</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="7"> <xf:label>Mines</xf:label> <xf:value>7</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="8"> <xf:label>Home</xf:label> <xf:value>8</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="deliveredBy"> <xf:label>Delivered by</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Doctor</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Medical assistant</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Midwife - private</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>Midwife - gov't</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="5"> <xf:label>CHO or CHN</xf:label> <xf:value>5</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="6"> <xf:label>Trained TBA</xf:label> <xf:value>6</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="7"> <xf:label>Untrained TBA</xf:label> <xf:value>7</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="8"> <xf:label>Friend or relative</xf:label> <xf:value>8</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select bind="complications"> <xf:label>Complications</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Eclampsia</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Puerperal inf/sepsis</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>PPH</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>Ruptured uterus</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="5"> <xf:label>Cardiac arrest</xf:label> <xf:value>5</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="6"> <xf:label>VVF</xf:label> <xf:value>6</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="7"> <xf:label>Drop foot</xf:label> <xf:value>7</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="8"> <xf:label>Puerperal psychosis</xf:label> <xf:value>8</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="9"> <xf:label>Other</xf:label> <xf:value>9</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select> <xf:select1 bind="vvf"> <xf:label>VVF</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Repaired</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Referred</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="maternalDeath"> <xf:label>Maternal death</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="comments"> <xf:label>Comments</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="child1Outcome"> <xf:label>Child 1 outcome</xf:label> <xf:item id="A"> <xf:label>Alive</xf:label> <xf:value>A</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="FSB"> <xf:label>Fresh Still Birth</xf:label> <xf:value>FSB</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="MSB"> <xf:label>Macerated Still Birth</xf:label> <xf:value>MSB</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="child1RegistrationType"> <xf:label>Child 1 reg. mode</xf:label> <xf:item id="USE_PREPRINTED_ID"> <xf:label>Pre-printed ID</xf:label> <xf:value>USE_PREPRINTED_ID</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="AUTO_GENERATE_ID"> <xf:label>Auto-generated ID</xf:label> <xf:value>AUTO_GENERATE_ID</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="child1MotechId"> <xf:label>Child 1 MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="child1Sex"> <xf:label>Child 1 sex</xf:label> <xf:item id="M"> <xf:label>Male</xf:label> <xf:value>M</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="F"> <xf:label>Female</xf:label> <xf:value>F</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="child1FirstName"> <xf:label>Child 1 name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="child1Weight">
